title: Tekken 8 Review - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Sign up for the Kinda Funny Membership to get ad-free shows, live recordings, and daily Greg Miller vlogs. Patreon.com/KindaFunny or YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames

Let's review Tekken 8 with Bless and some special guests.  

Follow Chris Scullion: https://twitter.com/scully1888 
Follow Mitchell Saltzman: https://twitter.com/JurassicRabbit

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:30 - Housekeeping
00:02:02 - Tekken 8 Review
00:09:49 - Mitchell Saltzman’s Thoughts
00:14:21 - Chris Scullion’s Thoughts
00:18:03 - What Makes Tekken 8 Stand Out?
00:28:24 - Super Ghost Battles
00:30:55 - Current Mains & Who is OP?!
00:35:56 - Biggest Criticisms?
00:39:55 - Who is this game for?
00:49:20 - Final Thoughts

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1
